channel.title: [NOOB QUESTION] Getting this error when running on linux
channel.description:
Hey everyone I'm fairly new to the linux operating system as every VPS I have ever purchased has been running Windows Server 2003 +. I have successfully installed Java on the VM, but can't get the server to run. I'm attempting to use the PK Planet source, as it comes with a linux friendly "run file." However, when I execute that, I get this error:
[code] Exception in thread "main" java.lang.NoClassDefFoundError: server Caused by: java.lang.ClassNotFoundException: server at java.net.URLClassLoader$1.run(URLClassLoader.java:202) at java.security.AccessController.doPrivileged(Native Method) at java.net.URLClassLoader.findClass(URLClassLoader.java:190) at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(ClassLoader.java:307) at sun.misc.Launcher$AppClassLoader.loadClass(Launcher.java:301) at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(ClassLoader.java:248) [/code]
Any ideas?

item.title: [NOOB QUESTION] Getting this error when running on linux
item.dc:creator: @odoat odoat
item.description:
@odoat wrote:

Hey everyone I’m fairly new to the linux operating system as every VPS I have ever purchased has been running Windows Server 2003 +. I have successfully installed Java on the VM, but can’t get the server to run. I’m attempting to use the PK Planet source, as it comes with a linux friendly “run file.” However, when I execute that, I get this error:

Exception in thread "main" java.lang.NoClassDefFoundError: server
Caused by: java.lang.ClassNotFoundException: server
        at java.net.URLClassLoader$1.run(URLClassLoader.java:202)
        at java.security.AccessController.doPrivileged(Native Method)
        at java.net.URLClassLoader.findClass(URLClassLoader.java:190)
        at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(ClassLoader.java:307)
        at sun.misc.Launcher$AppClassLoader.loadClass(Launcher.java:301)
        at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(ClassLoader.java:248)

Any ideas?
